mapper.select: select pdt.plan_detail_id, pd.plan_days_id, pd.plan_id, pdt.content_id, pdt.overview, c.content_name, a.title, a.addr1, a.addr2, a.first_image, a.first_image2 from plan_detail pdt left join plan_days pd on pd.plan_days_id = pdt.plan_days_id left join plan p on p.plan_id = pd.plan_id left join attraction_info a on pdt.content_id = a.content_id left join content_type c on a.content_type_id = c.content_type_id where p.plan_id=#{plan_id};
mapper.delete: delete pdt from ( plan p left join plan_days pd on p.plan_id = pd.plan_id left join plan_detail pdt on pd.plan_days_id = pdt.plan_days_id) where p.userid=#{userId};
